text: [Music]
[Music]
hello
this is raju ishodraya a cloud support
engineer here at the aws office in
seattle
today i'm going to show you how to
change the default payment method
associated with my account let's get
started
you can set a different payment method
for your aws account
by performing the following steps if you
haven't already added the payment method
to your aws account
then follow the steps from the knowledge
center article sign in to the billing
and cost management console
and then open the payment methods pane
next go to your preferred default
payment method
choose make default after you set a
payment method as the default payment
method
new aws bills are automatically charged
to that payment method your seller of
record information
or your preferred currency might impact
the payment methods available for your
account
please note if you change your default
payment method
at the end of an aws billing cycle
charges might still be billed to the
original payment method
if you have questions about your monthly
aws bill and payment methods
create an aws support case and then
select account on billing support
so now you know how to set a different
default payment method
for your aws account thank you for
watching
and happy cloud computing from all of us
here at aws
